name: allowusersearch
label: User Searching User

description: Hide Remember Me defines whether or not to even display the Remember Me checkbox on login pages.
name: usershiderememberme
label: Hide Remember Me

description: Remember Me Checked defines whether or not to default the Remember Me checkbox as checked.
name: usersremembermedefaultchecked
label: Remember Me Checked

description: Merchant Account is the entity where the client has their merchant account for online processing.
name: merchantaccount
label: Merchant Account

description: Merchant Tes tModeis a true false variable to turn  atesting environment on.  If true, any orders that are submitted will not proceed to the MerchantAccount.
name: merchanttestmode
label: Merchant Test Mode

description: Merchant Auto Redirect is a true false variable.  If true, any orders that are submitted will proceed to the MerchantAcount
name: merchantautoredirect
label: Merchant Auto Redirect

description: Merchant Logo stores the logo for use when redirected to a different site.
name: merchantlogo
label: Merchant Logo

description: Merchant Authorize Only is a true/false variable indicating whether to just authorize payment or authorize and process payment.  If true, then merchant only authorizes the order, but holds off on processing until a later time.
name: merchantauthorizeonly
label: Merchant Authorize Only

description: Merchant CC Accepted displays what credit cards are accepted by the merchant.
name: merchantccaccepted
label: Merchant CC Accepted

description: Keywords that show up in the keywords meta tag, Page tiltes and other locations on many modules.
name: siteprimarykeywords
label: Primary Keywords

name: sitesecondarykeywords
label: Secondary Keywords

label: Tax ID Number

name: captcha
label: Use Captcha

name: currency

name: currencysymbol
label: Currency Symbol

name: sitephonenumber
label: Phone Number

name: siteemailnoreplyaddress
label: No-Reply Address

description: Set the language for words around Tendenci that are translated.
name: localizationlanguage
label: Localization Language

description: Hide Tabs is a bit field defining whether or not to hide the tabs in ALL modules.  0=show 1=hide
name: hidetabs
label: Hide Tabs

description: Link or text containing your site policies.
name: sitepolicy
label: Site Policy

description: These are the API Credentials required to access the ConstantContact.com API.  It consist of the account username, account password, and developer API key in this format (e.g. username:password:key).
name: constantcontactapicredentials
label: Constant Contact API Credentials

description: This is the URL specific profile ID for Google Analytics.
name: semgoogleanalyticsprofileid
label: SEM Google Analytics Profile ID

description: The Google API key is used to integrate with Google tools (e.g. GeoCoding) We can continue to benefit from Google tools with 1 API key per domain.
name: googleapikey
label: Google API Key

description:
a  'a.m.' or 'p.m.' (Note that this is slightly different than PHP's output, because this includes periods to match Associated Press style.)
A  'AM' or 'PM'.
b  Month, textual, 3 letters, lowercase.
B  Not implemented.
c  ISO 8601 Format.
d  Day of the month, 2 digits with leading zeros.
D  Day of the week, textual, 3 letters.
f  Time, in 12-hour hours and minutes, with minutes left off if they're zero. Proprietary extension.
F  Month, textual, long.
g  Hour, 12-hour format without leading zeros.
G  Hour, 24-hour format without leading zeros.
h  Hour, 12-hour format.
H  Hour, 24-hour format.
i  Minutes.
I  Not implemented.
j  Day of the month without leading zeros.
l  Day of the week, textual, long.
L  Boolean for whether it's a leap year.
m  Month, 2 digits with leading zeros.
M  Month, textual, 3 letters.
n  Month without leading zeros.
N  Month abbreviation in Associated Press style. Proprietary extension.
O  Difference to Greenwich time in hours.
P  Time, in 12-hour hours, minutes and 'a.m.'/'p.m.', with minutes left off if they're zero and the special-case strings 'midnight and 'noon' if appropriate. Proprietary extension.
r  RFC 2822 formatted date.
s  Seconds, 2 digits with leading zeros.
S  English ordinal suffix for day of the month, 2 characters.
t  Number of days in the given month.
T  Time zone of this machine.
u  Microseconds.
U  Seconds since the Unix Epoch (January 1 1970 00:00:00 UTC).
w  Day of the week, digits without leading zeros.
W  ISO-8601 week number of year, with weeks starting on Monday.
y  Year, 2 digits.
Y  Year, 4 digits.
z  Day of the year.
Z  Time zone offset in seconds. The offset for timezones west of UTC is always negative, and for those east of UTC is always positive.
name: dateformat
label: Date Format

description:
Default protection set on a member once they are approved. Members can be as public or private as you want. Changing this setting will only affect future members.
  • Public - Everyone can see this member
  • Private - Only administrators can see this member
  • All-members - All members can see this member
  • Member-type - Only members of that membership type can see this member
name: memberprotection
label: Member Protection
